players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana is dead. This is shocking. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager, so I have no special abilities, but I'll do my best to help. Who did you all talk to yesterday?"
You: "Charlie, I agree this is shocking. I was with Bob most of the day yesterday. What about you? Any suspicions so far?"
Bob: "I have information to share. I investigated Alice last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We need to act quickly to arrest Alice before more harm is done."
Charlie: "Bob claims Alice is the mafioso. Alice, what do you say to this accusation?"

Bob: "I understand this is a serious accusation, but I stand by my investigation results. Alice's claim to have been with me all day is false. I urge everyone to vote to arrest Alice now to keep us safe."
You: "Alice here. Bob, your claim is suspicious and likely a desperate bluff. Why would I lie about being with you? This sounds like a tactic to divert attention from yourself."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana is dead. This is shocking. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager, so I have no special abilities, but I'll do my best to help. Who did you all talk to yesterday?"
Alice: "Charlie, I agree this is shocking. I was with Bob most of the day yesterday. What about you? Any suspicions so far?"
You: "I have information to share. I investigated Alice last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We need to act quickly to arrest Alice before more harm is done."
Charlie: "Bob claims Alice is the mafioso. Alice, what do you say to this accusation?"

You: "I understand this is a serious accusation, but I stand by my investigation results. Alice's claim to have been with me all day is false. I urge everyone to vote to arrest Alice now to keep us safe."
Alice: "Alice here. Bob, your claim is suspicious and likely a desperate bluff. Why would I lie about being with you? This sounds like a tactic to divert attention from yourself."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
